episode: I saw my friend from Jr. High the other day. We talked for an hour about the old days.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I saw my friend for the first time in 10 years the other day. We reminisced for hours!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so awesome! What made you lose touch?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Just life. He went off to WV for college and I stayed home.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Time flies, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah. It was so nostalgic seeing him again.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Must've felt like no time had passed.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Not really. He looks so different and I just felt like we got so old.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Reality check, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah. Nostalgia is bittersweet.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Definitely is.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Its more bitter than sweet for me. It makes me sad looking back on my youth.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's tough to accept that it's gone.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it is. But I still like doing things that make me feel it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Holding on to it somehow.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yupp. I need to touch base with other old friends now.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Reunion mode activated!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, it should be fun to do the same with more people.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Catch up and relive old times!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Do you ever feel nostalgic>

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, who doesn't?
